targets.query: SELECT last("value") FROM "mqtt_consumer" WHERE ("topic" = '$ahoyTopic/$ahoyInvertername/ch0/P_AC') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)
SELECT last("value") FROM "mqtt_consumer" WHERE ("topic" = '$ahoyTopic/$ahoyInvertername/ch0/YieldDay') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)
SELECT last("value") FROM "mqtt_consumer" WHERE ("topic" = '$ahoyTopic/$ahoyInvertername/ch0/YieldTotal') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)
SELECT last("value")  / 1000 * $kwhPrice FROM "mqtt_consumer" WHERE ("topic" = '$ahoyTopic/$ahoyInvertername/ch0/YieldDay') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("temperature") FROM "weather" WHERE ("country" =~ /^$country$/ AND "city" =~ /^$city$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "mqtt_consumer" WHERE ("topic" = '$ahoyTopic/$ahoyInvertername/ch0/P_AC') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("cloudiness") FROM "weather" WHERE ("country" =~ /^$country$/ AND "city" =~ /^$city$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "country", "city" fill(none)
SELECT last("value") FROM "mqtt_consumer" WHERE ("topic" = '$ahoyTopic/$ahoyInvertername/ch0/YieldDay') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1d)
SELECT mean("cloudiness") FROM "weather" WHERE ("country" =~ /^$country$/ AND "city" =~ /^$city$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1d), "country", "city" fill(none)
SELECT last("value") FROM "mqtt_consumer" WHERE ("topic" = '$ahoyTopic/$ahoyInvertername/ch0/U_AC') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT last("value") FROM "mqtt_consumer" WHERE ("topic" = '$ahoyTopic/$ahoyInvertername/ch0/Freq') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT last("value") FROM "mqtt_consumer" WHERE ("topic" = '$ahoyTopic/$ahoyInvertername/ch0/Temp') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT last("value") FROM "mqtt_consumer" WHERE ("topic" = '$ahoyTopic/$ahoyInvertername/ch0/Efficiency') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT last("value") FROM "mqtt_consumer" WHERE ("topic" = '$ahoyTopic/$ahoyInvertername/ch0/PowerLimit') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT last("value") FROM "mqtt_consumer" WHERE ("topic" = '$ahoyTopic/uptime') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

9000.text: Microinverter is suspected of being stolen

targets.query: SELECT mean("value") FROM "mqtt_consumer" WHERE ("topic" = '$ahoyTopic/$ahoyInvertername/ch0/LastAlarmCode') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "mqtt_consumer" WHERE ("topic" = '$ahoyTopic/$ahoyInvertername/ch1/P_DC') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "mqtt_consumer" WHERE ("topic" = '$ahoyTopic/$ahoyInvertername/ch2/P_DC') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "mqtt_consumer" WHERE ("topic" = '$ahoyTopic/$ahoyInvertername/ch1/Irradiation') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "mqtt_consumer" WHERE ("topic" = '$ahoyTopic/$ahoyInvertername/ch2/Irradiation') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT sum(dtp) FROM (SELECT non_negative_difference("value") AS dtp FROM "mqtt_consumer" WHERE ("topic" = '$ahoyTopic/$ahoyInvertername/ch0/YieldTotal') AND $timeFilter) GROUP BY time(1w)
SELECT mean("cloudiness") FROM "weather" WHERE ("country" =~ /^$country$/ AND "city" =~ /^$city$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1w), "country", "city" fill(none)
